Uses of Class
com.characterforming.jrte.RteException

  • Packages that use RteException 
    Package Description
    com.characterforming.jrte
    Main package provides the transduction factory class Jrte and the interfaces that define the application integration points.

    • Uses of RteException in com.characterforming.jrte

      Subclasses of RteException in com.characterforming.jrte 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  DomainErrorException
      Thrown by the runtime engine when no transition is defined for nul signal injected after receiving an input ordinal not recognized for current state.
      class  EffectorException
      Thrown by the runtime engine when an effector throws an exception
      class  GearboxException
      Thrown when there is a problem relating to the gearbox
      class  InputException
      Thrown when there is a problem with the input
      class  MarkLimitExceededException
      Thrown when the amount of marked data in an marked input exceeds the maximum
      class  TargetBindingException
      Thrown when there is a problem binding target effectors to a transduction
      class  TargetNotFoundException
      Thrown when the target class cannot be instantitated using a default constructor
      class  TransducerNotFoundException
      Thrown when a named transducer cannot be found in the gearbox
      Methods in com.characterforming.jrte that throw RteException 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void ITransduction.input(IInput[] inputs)
      Set up transduction inputs.
      static void Jrte.main(java.lang.String[] args)
      Default Jrte runtime transduces System.in to System.out, with an optional nil signal as input prefix.
      int ITransduction.run()
      Run the transduction with current input until the input or transduction stack is empty, or an effector returns RTE_PAUSE, or an exception is thrown.
      void ITransduction.start(java.lang.String transducer)
      Set up or reset a transduction with a specified transducer at its start state on top of the transducer stack.
      ITransduction Jrte.transduction(ITarget target)
      Bind an unbound target instance to a new transduction.
